short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to enable/disable zen mode on leetcode

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The LeetCode Zen Mode extension is here to help you focus on what really matters: solving coding problems! With Zen Mode, you can hide away distracting information such as the difficulty of the problem, the number of upvotes/downvotes, related questions, editorials, and more. This way, you can simulate a real-world interview setup and train yourself to solve problems under pressure. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced coder, Zen Mode will help you stay in the flow and achieve your goals faster.
